document_data.caption: The Tribunal with Gamorst at the center.
document_data.name: Gamorst
document_data.mainbody: When the lich [[Zarifrax]] attempted to slay a mortal to whom Gamorst had extended the Tribunal's protection, Gamorst swiftly destroyed him and claimed his [[phylactery]].
document_data.Description: As a member of the Tribunal, he was a powerful [[ghoul]] and a follower of [[Orcus]].
document_data.Personality: Gamorst was succinct and impatient. He immediately demanded tribute in exchange for the Tribunal's time, and he allowed for no interference in their decisions.
document_data.Abilities: He had the ability to destroy even a [[lich]] with a mere point of his finger.
